name: Pong 2048
description:
Pong 2048 is a remaster of pong with some new feature like:Fire/Ice and *Switch command*

You can play this game at 1vs1 and 1vs1vs1vs1 :P

You can play this game with an AI if you doesn't have a friend in your house 

I have firstly created this game to win a prize at a *contest*
